def pies(a,b):
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    i,j = 0,0
    while(j<len(b)):
        if(a[i]<=b[j]):
            i+=1
            j+=1
        else:
            j+=1
    return i

t = int(raw_input())

for i in range(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = raw_input()
    b = raw_input()
    a = a.split()
    b = b.split()
    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = int(a[i])
        b[i] = int(b[i])
    print pies(a,b)
